div.head: 子腸先下
div.div: prior descent of the infant’s intestine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: prior descent of the infant’s intestine

sense.def: Illness Sign of pan chang chan 盤腸產 , birth with a twisted intestine. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥 , Chan nan 產難 , Difficult births: 生產，子腸先下， 產後不收 , “During birth the child’s intestine descends first , and fails to retreat after the birth is complete”.
